about_the_game:
Build Your Own Candy Brand

Do you want to manage your own candy brand? Compete with other candy brands around the world by selling different candies in your own built store. Reach more customers by customizing your store and improving your confectionery. Remember, more customers means more revenue!

Different Confectionery

You can attract more customers by creating different types of confectionery such as jelly beans, chocolates and ice cream. Since the features of the candies you will create will affect the amount of sales and the cost of candies, you should create them using the right strategy.

Customize Your Store

Of course, the quality of their confectionery alone is not enough. You can customize your store by purchasing different items in your store. You can expand your store by purchasing the closed parts of the store. You can also send orders to distant customers by purchasing a vehicle for yourself. A better looking store brings in more customers.

Grow Your Brand

You can place customized advertisements for your brand using the billboards in the city. Remember, advertising is a bit expensive, but it is a very effective way to gain customers.
